entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 33.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending late in the evening then clearing. Local blowing snow in the evening. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 late in the evening. Low minus 33. Wind chill minus 13 in the evening and minus 47 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023
